parameters:
Hey, Belle-chan! Do you know anything about my
idiot son?

Ah~ I asked them to use it and they haven't come
back yet!

Where the hell is he selling oil?! That idiot son
of mine!

Oh! It's Belle! You seem a bit down, what's
wrong??
Hey, Clot! Your hands have stopped, right?
Hurry up and finish your work!
O-Ouch! Don't get so angry, please~!!
...Sorry, Belle! That's why, next time, okay!

Hey, Belle-chan! Do you know anything about my
idiot son?
When he comes back, he won't get away with it!

Hey, Belle-chan! I hope Dharma-sama gets better
soon!
By the way, do you know about our idiot?

I sent them out to search for mushrooms for
dinner, but they still haven't come back!

When they come back, make them stick mushrooms up
their nose and hang them upside down.

I know it's tough, but please cure Lord Dharma as
soon as possible!
My damn brat went out and hasn't come back again!

When they come back, I'll blow the trumpet loudly
from their rear end.
Darma-sama has recovered? That's great to hear...

My damn brat has gone completely off the rails...
They haven't come back at all.
Not having a mother... is really... damn...
I must have made you go through a lot of pain...
I should have thought more about it...

I was too strict, I'm sorryyy! Come back, Clot,
pleeaase!

Where did that stupid child wander off to!! How
much do they think I've been worried?!
Come here, you!! I'll beat you to a pulp!!

You disobedient child!! How dare you do this to
me, how dare you?!
Clot has been caught by the old man...!!

Oh! It's Belle! You seem a bit down, what's
wrong??
Hey, Clot! Your hands have stopped, right?
Hurry up and finish your work!
O-Ouch! Don't get so angry, please~!!
...Sorry, Belle! That's why, next time, okay!

S-Sorry... Lately, I've been going out without
permission and breaking curfew...
I've been prohibited from going out...
It seems like they're really angry this time...

I'm sorry, Belle. My incompetent child has been
causing trouble.

This person will be prohibited from going out for
a while. They will reflect on their actions
properly.

Sorry, but please leave this person alone for a
while.

(I'm really sorry... at a time like this... damn
it)

Clot... Thank you for listening and giving me
advice about various things.

(Just because there's no time, you're going with
someone else...)
Shut up and focus on your work!
